title: Ryan Clark
text:
Ryan Clark

Assistant Professor of Finance University of Nebraska-Lincoln rclark23@unl.edu


  Email    Faculty Website    LinkedIn    Google Scholar 




About Me
I am an assistant professor of finance at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. My research interests include corporate finance, corporate governance, insider trading, and household finance. My goal is to support the fair and efficient functioning of financial markets and to promote responsible financial decision making for individuals.
Prior to my appointment at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, I obtained my Ph.D.Â in Finance from the University of Kansas and my B.S. in Finance and Mathematics from the University of Nebraska at Kearney.
